steps.title: Gather and prepare materials
steps.description: Collect all required ingredients and equipment, and prep produce to ensure a smooth cooking and assembly process.

substeps.text: Verify ingredient availability: Ground beef patty (1/4 lb), Hamburger bun, American cheese slice, Lettuce leaf, Tomato slice, Red onion rings, Pickle slices, Sauce (ketchup/mustard/mayonnaise), Salt & pepper
Prepare equipment: Grill or griddle, Spatula, Grill press (optional), Serving tray
Wash and pat dry lettuce, tomato, onion; slice if needed

steps.title: Preheat and ready the grill
steps.description: Set up the cooking surface to the correct temperature for searing and safe cooking.

substeps.text: Clean and lightly oil the cooking surface
Stage tools (spatula, optional grill press, tray) within easy reach

steps.title: Form and season the patty
steps.description: Shape the ground beef and season to ensure even cooking and balanced flavor.

substeps.text: Gently form 1/4 lb ground beef into a patty about 1 cm (0.4 in) thick
Season both sides with a pinch of salt and pepper

steps.title: Grill the patty to doneness
steps.description: Cook the patty to a safe internal temperature with a proper sear.

substeps.text: Place the patty on the hot grill and cook for 3 minutes
Flip the patty and cook for another 3 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 71째C (160째F) and juices run clear

steps.title: Melt the cheese
steps.description: Finish the patty with melted cheese for classic cheeseburger flavor and texture.

substeps.text: During the last 30 seconds of cooking, place 1 slice of American cheese on the patty to melt

steps.title: Toast and sauce the bun
steps.description: Lightly toast the bun and apply sauces to both sides for flavor distribution and texture.

substeps.text: Lightly toast the hamburger bun on the grill for 30 seconds
Spread a thin layer of chosen sauce on the inside of both the top and bottom buns

steps.title: Assemble and serve the burger
steps.description: Build the burger in the specified order and serve immediately to maintain optimal temperature and texture.

substeps.text: Place the cooked, cheesy patty on the bottom bun
Layer toppings in order: lettuce, tomato, red onion, pickles
Place the top bun on the assembled burger
Serve immediately while hot on a serving tray
